original: <color=#FFE787>使用限制：</color><color=#ccffcc>所有場合皆可使用</color>對敵方<color=#ccffcc>5</color>名武將附加盲目狀態，同時以 <color=#ccffcc>50%</color> 的機率對敵方所有士兵附加盲目狀態<color=#FFE787>武將盲目：</color><color=#ccffcc>-50%</color> 命中率，持續 <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(4951)@</color> 秒<color=#FFE787>士兵盲目：</color><color=#ccffcc>-80%</color> 命中率，持續 <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(134)@</color> 秒
text: <color=#FFE787>Restrictions on use: </color><color=#ccffcc>Can be used in all occasions</color>Add blind status to the enemy <color=#ccffcc>5</color>. At the same time, with the probability of <color=#ccffcc>50%</color>, the blindness status is added to all enemy soldiers<color=#FFE787>The general blindness: </color><color=#ccffcc>-50%</color> Hit rate, continuous <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(4951)@</color> seconds <color=#FFE787>Soldier blindly: </color><color=#ccffcc>-80%</color> Hit rate, Last <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(134)@</color> seconds
